ygData.subject: Sol B stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: Ganna drag there by FF around midnight yesterday to take a place in a group he was in there. Generally was peaceful, but lag grew very bad and I LD twice. The
ygData.messageBody:
Ganna drag there by FF around midnight yesterday to take a place in a
group he was in there.

Generally was peaceful, but lag grew very bad and I LD twice. The 2nd
time I regain connection, someone had train a lava guardian to the zone,
and the damn ele killed me before I knew anything.

I forgot to change my bind and is stuck at NK. Corpse is still at Sol B
entrace....... Today, log in and try to run to Sol B, but ganna a lot of
lag spike and got disconnected 5 times. In 3hrs of trying, I only manage
to run to HH, then ganna LD again, and cannot connect back......
